briefTitle: Acute and Long-term Cardiovascular Toxicity After Modern Radiotherapy for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Acute and Long-term Cardiovascular Toxicity After Modern Radiotherapy for Breast Cancer - a Prospective Longitudinal Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* diagnosis of breast cancer
* expected life-expectancy above 10 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* Not willing to participate
